title: Blue Fire
description: Nya has survived battles with the Luminary & freed the Takers who were enslaved at the Healer's League. But the war rages on. Nya, Tali & friends are in hiding, plotting their escape as the Duke posts a ransom for their capture. But plans are thwarted by treachery & kidnap as trackers, rascals & soldiers overwhelm them.
author: Janice Hardy
